requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or AMD equivalent with at least 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon 570 with at least 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible

results.name: Blipblorp the Blob in Escape from the Absurdist Hellscape
